item.title: PWB Conclusions and the Future
item.description: The results As I posted previously, I was taking the PWB course from Offensive Security. I am happy to report that I passed with flying colors (100%)! This is the best email I’ve ever received: Advice for new students During the course, I learned several things, including many things about myself. * Do the PDF/Video work first. If you wait until the end, you will hate your life. It’s so droll and boring.
